response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe holds immense value for you. This product, which I am confident will significantly enhance your endeavors and contribute to your success, is priced at $1,200,000.

Given its worth to you, I am certain this investment will yield substantial returns and meet your expectations. I understand the importance of making informed decisions and ensuring that all parties involved benefit. Therefore, I am offering you a special deal that I believe will be attractive to you.

Please consider the following offer carefully:
- Product Price: $1,200,000

Should you choose to accept this offer, I am committed to providing exceptional service and support throughout the transaction process. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out.

I look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this valuable product into your possession.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
